00052 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00053 /// @class PhysMotionState
00054 /// @headerfile physactor.h
00055 /// @brief This class is used by the actor class to sync between the physics world and the graphical world.
00056 /// @details This class provides the link for position and orientation between the two worlds in the engine.
00057 /// This is called on every step(frame) of the world to sync the actor if it has moved.
00058 ///////////////////////////////////////
00059 
00060 class PhysMotionState : public btMotionState {
00061     private:
00062         friend class ActorBase;
00063         Ogre::SceneNode* snode;
00064         btTransform initposition;
00065 
00066     public:
00067         /// @brief Blank Constructor.
00068         /// @details Basic no-initialization constructor.
00069         PhysMotionState();
00070         /// @brief Constructor.
00071         /// @details The class constructor.
00072         /// @param Scenenode The scenenode belonging to the actor.
00073         PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00074         /// @brief Destructor.
00075         /// @details The class destructor.
00076         virtual ~PhysMotionState();
00077         /// @brief Sets the scenenode.
00078         /// @details Sets the scenenode to be sync'd every step.
00079         /// @param Scenenode The scenenode belonging to the actor.
00080         void SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00081         /// @brief Sets the initial position.
00082         /// @details Sets the position the actor will be placed in when it is added to the world.
00083         /// This function is called on by the ActorBase function SetInitPosition().
00084         /// @param Position The vector3 representing the location to be used.
00085         void SetPosition(PhysVector3 position);
00086         /// @brief Sets the initial orientation.
00087         /// @details Sets the orientation the actor will have when it is added to the world.
00088         /// This function is called on by the ActorBase function SetInitOrientation().
00089         /// @param Orientation The vector3 representing the orientation to be used.
00090         void SetOrientation(Quaternion orientation);
00091 
00092         /// @brief Sets the initial position.
00093         /// @details This function is called on by the physics world upon adding the actor to the world.
00094         /// This function uses the previous set vector3 that was set with SetInitPosition(). @n
00095         /// Default position is (0,0,0).
00096         /// @param WorldTrans The location and orientation data.
00097         virtual void getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const;
00098         /// @brief Updates the position and orientation.
00099         /// @details This function is called each step(frame) by the physics world to sync the physics and graphical worlds.
00100         /// @param WorldTrans The location and orientation data.
00101         virtual void setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans);
00102 };
00103

00107 ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group, PhysWorld* World)
00108 {
00109     this->GameWorld = World;
00110     this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00111     this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00112     this->MotionState = new PhysMotionState(this->node);
00113     this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00114     this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00115 }
00116 
00117 ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00118 {
00119     delete MotionState;
00120     delete Shape;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void ActorBase::CreateTrimesh()
00124 {
00125     // Get the mesh from the entity
00126     Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00127 
00128     // Get the submesh and associated data
00129     Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00130 
00131     Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00132     Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00133 
00134     // Get the position element
00135     const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00136 
00137     // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00138     Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00139 
00140     // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00141     Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00142 
00143     // Get the number of triangles
00144     unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00145 
00146     // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00147     Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00148     unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00149 
00150     // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00151     unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00152 
00153     float* pReal = NULL;
00154 
00155     for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00156     {
00157         posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00158         Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00159         vertices[j] = pt;
00160     }
00161 
00162     vBuffer->unlock();
00163 
00164     size_t index_offset = 0;
00165 
00166     bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00167 
00168     // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00169     unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00170     unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00171 
00172     if (use32bitindexes)
00173     {
00174         for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00175         {
00176             indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00177         }
00178     }
00179     else
00180     {
00181         for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00182         {
00183          indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00184         }
00185     }
00186 
00187     iBuffer->unlock();
00188 
00189     // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00190 
00191     // The Bullet triangle mesh
00192     btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00193 
00194     // Setup the tri mesh
00195     btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00196     int i=0;
00197 
00198     // For every triangle
00199     for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00200     {
00201         // Set each vertex
00202 
00203         vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00204 
00205         vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00206 
00207         vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00208 
00209         // Add it into the trimesh
00210         trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00211 
00212         // Increase index count
00213         i+=3;
00214     }
00215 
00216     // --------------- Cleanup
00217 
00218     delete[] vertices;
00219     delete[] indices;
00220     delete Shape;
00221 
00222     ///TODO - Check for thread safety
00223     //Shape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(trimesh, true);
00224     btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(trimesh);
00225     btShapeHull *hull = new btShapeHull(tmpshape);
00226     btScalar margin = tmpshape->getMargin();
00227     hull->buildHull(margin);
00228     //Shape=hull;
00229     tmpshape->setUserPointer(hull);
00230     btConvexHullShape* convexShape = new btConvexHullShape();
00231     for (unsigned b=0;b<hull->numVertices();b++)
00232     {
00233         convexShape->addPoint(hull->getVertexPointer()[b]);
00234     }
00235     delete tmpshape;
00236     delete hull;
00237     Shape = convexShape;
00238 }

00240 void ActorBase::CreateEntity (String name, String file, String group)
00241 {
00242     this->entity = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createEntity(name, file, group);
00243 }
00244 
00245 void ActorBase::CreateSceneNode ()
00246 {
00247     this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00248 }

00250 void ActorBase::SetOgreLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00251 {
00252     this->node->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00253 }
00254 
00255 PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation()
00256 {
00257     PhysVector3 temp;
00258     temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00259     return temp;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00263 {
00264     btTransform temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00265     temp.setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00266 }
00267 
00268 PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation()
00269 {
00270     PhysVector3 temp;
00271     btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00272     temp.ExtractBulletVector3(trans.getOrigin());
00273     return temp;
00274 }
00275 
00276 void ActorBase::SetBulletInitLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00277 {
00278     this->MotionState->initposition.setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00279 }

00281 void ActorBase::SetOgreOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00282 {
00283     this->node->setOrientation(Rotation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00284 }
00285 
00286 void ActorBase::SetBulletOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00287 {
00288     btTransform temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00289     temp.setRotation(Rotation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00290 }

00292 void ActorBase::SetLocation (Real x, Real y, Real z)
00293 {
00294     PhysVector3 temp(x,y,z);
00295     this->SetLocation(temp);
00296 }
00297 
00298 void ActorBase::SetLocation (PhysVector3 Place)
00299 {
00300     this->SetBulletLocation(Place);
00301     this->SetOgreLocation(Place);
00302 }
00303 
00304 PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetLocation()
00305 {
00306     return this->GetBulletLocation();
00307 }

00309 void ActorBase::SetInitLocation(PhysVector3 Location)
00310 {
00311     this->SetBulletInitLocation(Location);

00314 void ActorBase::SetInitOrientation(Quaternion Orientation)
00315 {

00319 void ActorBase::SetOrientation (Real x, Real y, Real z, Real w)
00320 {
00321     Quaternion temp(x,y,z,w);
00322     this->SetOrientation(temp);
00323 }

00325 void ActorBase::SetOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00326 {
00327     this->SetBulletOrientation(Rotation);
00328     this->SetOgreOrientation(Rotation);
00329 }
00330 
00331 void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00332 {
00333     PhysVector3 temp;
00334     temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->MotionState->initposition.getOrigin());
00335     this->node->setPosition(temp.GetOgreVector3());
00336     this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00337 }
00338 
00339 void ActorBase::SetKinematic()
00340 {
00341     int x=2;
00342     this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(x);
00343 }
00344 
00345 void ActorBase::SetStatic()
00346 {
00347     int x=1;
00348     this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(x);
00349 }

00355 {
00356     this->CreateRigidObject(mass);

00359 ActorRigid::~ActorRigid ()
00360 {
00361     delete physrigidbody;
00362 }

00364 void ActorRigid::CreateRigidObject (Real pmass)
00365 {
00366     btScalar bmass=pmass;
00367     this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00368     CollisionObject=physrigidbody;
00369 }
00370 
00371 void ActorRigid::AddObjectToWorld (PhysWorld *TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* World)
00372 {
00373     World->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00374     AttachToGraphics();
00375 }

00377 void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMesh()
00378 {
00379     this->CreateTrimesh();
00380     this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00381 }

00415 PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState()
00416 {
00417     this->initposition.setIdentity();
00418 }

00420 PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00421 {
00422     this->snode=scenenode;
00423     this->initposition.setIdentity();
00424 }
00425 
00426 PhysMotionState::~PhysMotionState()
00427 {
00428     if (snode!=NULL)
00429     {
00430         delete snode;
00431     }
00432 }

00434 void PhysMotionState::SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00435 {
00436     this->snode=scenenode;
00437 }

00439 void PhysMotionState::SetPosition(PhysVector3 position)
00440 {
00441     this->initposition.setOrigin(position.GetBulletVector3());
00442 }
00443 
00444 void PhysMotionState::SetOrientation(Quaternion orientation)
00445 {
00446     this->initposition.setRotation(orientation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00447 }
00448 
00449 void PhysMotionState::getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const
00450 {
00451     worldTrans=initposition;
00452 }
00453 
00454 void PhysMotionState::setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans)
00455 {
00456     btQuaternion rotation = worldTrans.getRotation();
00457     this->snode->setOrientation(rotation.w(), rotation.x(), rotation.y(), rotation.z());
00458     btVector3 position = worldTrans.getOrigin();
00459     this->snode->setPosition(position.x(), position.y(), position.z());
00460 }
